title: Need another CDR item?
body:
I've noticed a distinct lack of "good" cdr choices on certain champions {{champion:30}} {{champion:38}}{{champion:34}}  mainly.

Basically champions who like building {{item:3027}} or {{item:3070}}  first and skip {{item:3165}} {{item:3174}}  usually.

Also with champions like {{champion:55}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:85}} {{champion:82}}  who would benefit from an AP+CDR item that doesnt have mana regen, I think there is room for another 1 or add CDR to Ludens? Though that might push Ludens over the top

replies.body:
Honestly the thing is their shouldn't be good CDR items on a massive chunk of those champions.

If your wanting CDR you should be forced to build it not have it in your build path (Also you could argue building Morello/Athene's on both Anivia and Karthus).

As for the Energy/No resourse champions you mentioned.

Kat doesn't need CDR cause she has Resets.
Akali doesn't need CDR cause energy is a bitch.
Kennen doesn't need CDR cause energy is a bitch.
Morde doesn't really need CDR cause his main cooldowns are rather low anyway.
